# Syllaboom

> Turn your syllabus into a complete study system in 90 seconds.

## What is Syllaboom?

Syllaboom is an AI-powered tool that transforms any college or university syllabus PDF into a comprehensive study system. Students upload their syllabus and receive:

- **Smart Calendar**: All deadlines, exams, and class meetings exported to Google Calendar/iCal
- **Grade Calculator**: Track assignments, see current grade, calculate what's needed on finals
- **Week-by-Week Battle Plan**: Strategic study schedule with danger zones flagged
- **Flashcards**: Key terms and concepts for each topic
- **Practice Questions**: Self-assessment questions for exam prep

## Pricing

- Single Class: $3 (one-time)
- Semester Pack: $8 (up to 6 classes)

## How It Works

1. Upload your syllabus PDF
2. AI extracts dates, grading weights, topics, and policies
3. Receive your complete study system in ~90 seconds

## Privacy

- No user accounts required
- Syllabus data is processed and immediately discarded
- Results stored only in the user's browser (localStorage)
- No data is retained on servers

## Contact

- Email: hello@syllaboom.com
- Website: https://syllaboom.com

## Technical Details

- Supports any text-based PDF syllabus
- Works for any class at any school
- Calendar export compatible with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook
- Grade data exportable as CSV

## Target Users

- College and university students
- Students who want to plan their semester strategically
- Students who need help tracking assignments and grades
